title: Incandescent Staff
content:
Incandescent Staff Very Rare 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Ranged Spell Attack +1 Grants Resistance to Fire Damage Fire Bolt Fireball Main Hand OnlyTopple Etchings course red-hot through the lenght of this staff, the script of primordial fire writ in flame.
